entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
